## Description {#details}

Provide a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> specialized for std::optional&lt;From&gt;.

It&#39;s assumed that if the input is std::optional&lt;From&gt; that the output can be std::optional&lt;To&gt;. If that&#39;s not the case, specialize <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> for your use case.

Definition at line 539 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
